channel.title: Work Experience on Martim's Portfolio

item.title: Summer Internship @ Sky Portugal
item.description: A Memorable Start to My Career This summer, I had the incredible opportunity to begin my professional journey as an Apprentice Backend Developer at Sky Portugal. It was a transformative experience where I learned, grew, and collaborated with a talented and supportive team in an inspiring and dynamic environment. Key Contributions and Achievements One of the highlights of my internship was working on the development, enhancement, and deployment of a Slack Bot designed to automate repetitive manual processes.
